kit.leader_skill: All Types Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +70%

super_attack.name: Super Kamehameha (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Causes supreme damage to enemy; Raises ATK & DEF for 3 turns

passive_skill.name: Mental Prowess in Battle
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 150% up; Per "GT Heroes" Category ally attacking in the same turn: Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; ATK 100% up when attacking; DEF 70% up when receiving an attack; When all allies attacking in the same turn are "GT Heroes" Category characters: ATK 100% up; Chance of performing a critical hit & damage reduction rate 50% up; When HP is 50% or less, or when there is a "GT Bosses" Category enemy: Performs a critical hit; Guards all attacks
